mapper.update: update plandetail set Parent_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Product_No = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Product_Name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Subtotal = #{subtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, Parent_ID, Product_No, Product_Name, Quantity, Unit, Price, Subtotal, `Describe` from plandetail where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, Parent_ID, Product_No, Product_Name, Quantity, Unit, Price, Subtotal, `Describe` from plandetail
